name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 021
description: Our Economy is based on the threat of poverty.  That’s something I heard recently and it really resonated with me. Axios  recently reported that up to 40% of employees are currently looking to quit their jobs in something being dubbed “The Great Resignation.”  The pandemic forced people to reconsider their work life balance and what they’re willing to do to stay employed; and now with enhanced unemployment benefits being extended workers have the opportunity to take their time in finding their next ideal job.  For the time being they aren’t forced into a job they don’t want to do or feel safe doing under threat of poverty, the power balance has shifted from employer to employee.  Hopefully this is a step in the right direction for working conditions on the job, fair salaries, and a right to choose how we want to live our lives. Because an economy based on the threat of poverty isn’t right, simple as that.
